name: build-utils
title: Build Utils
author: Konrad Guzek
description:
This mod adds several Quality of Life additions for users who have the vanilla setting 'Pick ghost items if no items are available' enabled.

Added settings:
• Enable automatic ghost swap on pickup – Automatically swaps ghost to real item when you pick up items from the ground
• Enable automatic ghost select on depletion – Automatically selects ghost when you run out of an item while building
